Articles.Content:
Hello!!!, I think everyone (or many) modder from doing addon for KSP thought about creating a rocket, Saturn V or N1. I was fortunate, and after a few attempts, I still brought the Rocket to a playable state, now I can show it to you.

WARNING: The objective was to create an add-on is not an exact copy of the rocket, the addon created exclusively for the launch of the payload, that roughly the conclusions of the Rocket. hope you enjoy.

Some pictures.

S-IC

S-II

S-IVB

Version 1.1

-Completely redesigned catalog files (reduced size fashion in General)

-some cosmetic additives to rocket

-Added Agency for career games

-added support for plugin "KM-Gimbal_3" for F-1

WARNING - Uninstall the old version, all the files of the old version just won't work.

Apollo missions is missing ???

The Mission of Apollo on the way.

SLA is terrible, and yet I do not understand how it works???

SLA I did recently, so it's so ... It works by jettison, and looks at the engine panel, pressing all the covers fall off randomly.

special thanks!!!

DennyTX, for permission to use his model J-2!!!

Piwa/Nathankell/bimu,Piwa for help in understanding this rocket, and all of these retro motors, as well for the F-1 engine. Nathan for creating configuration for RSS versions for Saturn (for Piwa). Bimu for the very development of the engine, which he later Piwa gave to me.

DOWNLOAD

Stock - https://www.dropbox.com/sh/t9her1hoixkfnxb/AADqxTP2iRdzZqkP5fKbW093a?dl=0

RSS (Unfortunately not support RO) - https://www.dropbox.com/sh/5lc3mlfffm39rzz/AAB6DyRRKoHvG48YBYboAVcVa?dl=0

For RSS version required

RSS- http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55145-0-22-WIP-Alpha-Real-Solar-System-(Kerbin-Earth-rescale-etc)-v3

RF- http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/64118

FAR- http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/20451-0-90-Ferram-Aerospace-Research-v0-14-6-12-27-14

RECOMMENDED ADDONS

SSE - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55985-0-90-Space-Shuttle-Engines-%28Dec-27%29 -Plugin for F-1.

KJR- http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55657-0-22-Kerbal-Joint-Reinforcement-v1-0-Properly-Rigid-Part-Connections -Will significantly help your rocket to be stronger.

All rights reserved.

Edited January 22, 2015 by DECQ

Omyholymotherofgod...:0.0: That looks even more detailed than the real Saturn V!!! Aaand it's RSS compatible! You sir, you are genius.

BTW, maybe editing the thread title to Saturn V or so? Nobody knows what you mean with SV )

ERMAHGERD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! :0.0: This is really impressive, and really more realistic in texture than the FASA Saturn V. Speaking of FASA, how does this set itself apart from the FASA Saturn V, other than the textures?

Edited January 2, 2015 by AppleDavidJeans

ERMAHGERD!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! :0.0: This is really impressive, and really more realistic in texture than the FASA Saturn V. Speaking of FASA, how does this set itself apart from the FASA Saturn V, other than the textures?

Frankly, unfortunately I have never seen the Saturn V from FASA :-/, but I think it's amazing.

- - - Updated - - -

Omyholymotherofgod...:0.0: That looks even more detailed than the real Saturn V!!! Aaand it's RSS compatible! You sir, you are genius.

BTW, maybe editing the thread title to Saturn V or so? Nobody knows what you mean with SV )

Okay, in the next update to change the name of fasting.

Guys, can ask a question. Is it worth it to put my N1, or many? In any case, I will leave it for private use:-)

Edited January 6, 2015 by DECQ
Z
YES lets have the N-1 !!!
Yes, let's see it!
Its always worth posting new versions of stuff that already exists on the forums. I'd love to see your take on it. Any future plans?

FASA, for the most part, is built to be used with stock Kerbal. It is scaled and textured to match the stock game.

They are 2.5m and 5m scaled parts as apposed to their real world sizes.

This mod and some others use real world sizes and textures for use with the Real Solar System mod.

Yes put the N1 up....

Also good job on the rocket it looks nice. What did you model it in?
Hmmm... intrigueing...i'll wait and see how popular this one is before trying this myself

Hmmm... intrigueing...i'll wait and see how popular this one is before trying this myself

That's the most ridiculous thing I've ever seen.

Well, I will show N-1, but it is very crude and show practically nothing. About plans for the future-Refinement Saturn, Apollo and N-1, I have a lot of models, Orion, suffering buran, LEM and even the space shuttle (but it is designed for the old model, and I probably will leave it for yourself).

photo N1-

Again, work on the missile started recently, so it need a lot of work.

- - - Updated - - -

FASA, for the most part, is built to be used with stock Kerbal. It is scaled and textured to match the stock game.

They are 2.5m and 5m scaled parts as apposed to their real world sizes.

This mod and some others use real world sizes and textures for use with the Real Solar System mod.

Yes put the N1 up....

Also good job on the rocket it looks nice. What did you model it in?

You're right, at first I did Rocket solely for RSS, at the last moment made for the stock version because of problems with the RO. Soon to be updated 99% of which is made raidernick, for which I am very grateful to him. P.s. I do not understand your question because of an interpreter, did you mean to model than I do? if so, then Blender 3D.

That's the most ridiculous thing I've ever seen.

My reasoning is simple...if it appears to exceed, or almost exceed the number of downloads of my favorite Saturn Vs, then i'll download it

Otherwise... *shrugs*
Weren't there more engines on the first stage?

My reasoning is simple...if it appears to exceed, or almost exceed the number of downloads of my favorite Saturn Vs, then i'll download it

Otherwise... *shrugs*

Easier and faster:

Try it for yourself, if you like it, keep it;

if you don't, delete it.

That kinda rimed.

Weren't there more engines on the first stage?

http://www.aerospaceweb.org/question/spacecraft/russia/n1-1.jpg

hehe, I know the lower part of a separate and individual engines (like dennyTx), The main problem in the steering engines, RCS they do not work, will have to do with Gimbal.

Weren't there more engines on the first stage?

http://www.aerospaceweb.org/question/spacecraft/russia/n1-1.jpg

Originally Koroljow planned to use 24 engines on the first stage, but after he died the guy who carried the project on realized that 24 engines weren't enough, so he added 6 more engines in the center. So DECQ's N-1 is correct, when you take the original N-1 as reference. But it looks great DECQ! Keep it up!

Thank Kartoffelkuchen, I'm glad you like it, although this is not the final version. In fact, 30 engines will of course, I just do not put the point of attachment. :-)

- - - Updated - - -

My reasoning is simple...if it appears to exceed, or almost exceed the number of downloads of my favorite Saturn Vs, then i'll download it

Otherwise... *shrugs*

I see you love and appreciate SV of KSP community,I also like the different versions of the SV, and probably even remember the very first version. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/29411-Apollo-Mission-Pack-Development-%28Beta-version-released%21%29

Maybe I can ask you to download my version of the rocket? I would be interested to hear your opinion about it.
That N1 is truly amazing, and I hope you continue work on it.
This is just beautiful.

hello everyone, I missed a couple of days. Apollo missions on the way. several screenshots.

Having problems with IVA, or rather, I hate to do IVA :-). But try to understand fully in its work.

Oh wooow. I'm impressed! Even position lights on Service Module! But one suggestion maybe: Could you try to make the LEM "gold foil" texture a bit more realistic? It looks a bit flat...and painted, if you know what I mean. Something in the direction of FASA's LEM Texture would be awesome! I'm really looking forward to the IVA (s), will you also make oldstyle Raster Prop monittors as Flight computers?
wow, such big, very me!

Oh wooow. I'm impressed! Even position lights on Service Module! But one suggestion maybe: Could you try to make the LEM "gold foil" texture a bit more realistic? It looks a bit flat...and painted, if you know what I mean. Something in the direction of FASA's LEM Texture would be awesome! I'm really looking forward to the IVA (s), will you also make oldstyle Raster Prop monittors as Flight computers?

Yes, I too do not like this gold foil, but I haven't found a decent replacement textures. And what about willow, I learned to put kerbov into 3 days ago, so I hope to create at least in stock style, makes no mention of the RPM.

-some cosmetic additives to rocket

-Added Agency for career games

-added support for plugin "KM-Gimbal_3" for F-1
